name: df-ple
comment: Define "less than or equal to" ordering extractor for posets and related structures. We use ` ; 1 0 ` for the index to avoid conflict with ` 1 ` through ` 9 ` used for other purposes. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Sep-2021.)
